knimeNode.name: Hive to Spark (Labs)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Imports the result of an incoming Hive query into Spark as a DataFrame/RDD.

fullDescription.intro: Imports the result of an incoming Hive query into Spark as a DataFrame/RDD. The query is executed using Spark SQL, which supports a subset of Hive's own SQL dialect. The limitations of Spark SQL are described in the Spark documentation.

ports.outPort: Spark DataFrame/RDD which contains the result of the Hive query
